title: A Christmas Miracle
description: Christie has defined herself by her wheelchair and has created a world filled with ‘I can’t’. When she meets her marathon running, salsa dancing neighbor, Marcus, he tries to show her that there is more to life than self-imposed limits and other peoples’ judgments.Will Christie open her heart and her mind to her sexy neighbor, or will the pain of her past keep her a prisoner in her own life?Christmas short story contest winner from Books to Go Now
author: Danica Winters
